GSD.description: git.io is no longer allowing new URLs to be registered for shortening, and it has been announced that git.io will be deprecated, but no date was provided git.io appears in GitHub in over 476,000 instances of code and data, 5,000 commits, 9000 issues, 827 wikis, 76 Discussions and 4 packages, it is unknown what impact breaking all these URLs will have. However in looking at Google results it is clear a number of installation tools will be broken, e.g. from https://get-coursier.io/docs/cli-installation one of the commands includes "curl -fLo cs https://git.io/coursier-cli-"$(uname | tr LD ld)"" which of course will break.
